column4: hello everyone how come i just booted up on ubuntu 10.04 and im getting a gdm with a login required?
why not?
since when theres a login required i dont even know what sthe login on this livecd never happened before
jub369: no usb on the laptop? how old is this thing again?
so your booting from the LiveCD and it's asking you to login?
yes
makes no sense ...
it doesnt
your at a login screen and your running straight from the bootup CD?
correct
did you do a logout or anything?
nope i just popped in the cd, went to the kitchen for 10mins came back and was at login prompt
and what is on the machine? Windows?
yes
ddi you make this CD yourself?
yes
and was it an ISO from the Ubuntu site?
yes i just burned it on here from my macbook
turn the system off and try again ... this time stick around and watch ....
doing so now
and it is definitely an Ubuntu login ...
